attributes.action: Reduce the age of mammogram testing from 50 to 30.
attributes.additional_details:
I’m 39 and have recently been diagnosed with breast cancer. I’d like to raise more awareness and help as many people as possible.

If I can help just one person not have to go through what I am , I’ll be incredibly happy.
attributes.background: We need to be be checking earlier, 50 I believe is too late. Let’s get checking from the age of 30.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Offer breast screenings for cancer to women from the age of 30
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576989

We're sorry to hear about your diagnosis and we wish you and your family well for any treatment you may be undergoing.
